UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a regular customer user in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

SellerProfile.title: Seller Profile
SellerProfile.description: Represents a seller user in the system, extending the base user profile.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

fullName.description: The seller's full name or business name.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the seller account was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for regular users.

/sellers/{sellerId}.description: Stores public profile information for sellers.
